venue.address_1: At the end of Zealand Road
venue.name: Zealand Parking Lot
venue.address_3: drive to the end and park in the lots

item.description:
A combination of a easy paced trail running and hiking.

We will start with a easy paced trail run/fast hike for the 10 mile approach via Zealand, Ethan Pond, Shoal Pond, Carrigain Notch trails to the Desolation trail.

Then ascend Mt Carrigain via the 1.9 mile Desolation trail

Then take the Signal Ridge trail to Sawyer Road - a nice 5 mile descent.

We will meet at the Zealand Road Parking area.
item.name: Mt Carrigain - trail run/hike - ADVANCED
